website_summaries.verdict: This ice maker's clear lid lets you see when the basket is full, so you can empty and get back to making ice right away.
pros: This machine makes 9 ice cubes in about 7 minutes
Can produce up to 26 pounds in 24 hours
LED controls, including choice of cube size
Basket holds 2 pounds of ice at a time
cons: Stops making ice when basket fills
Many customers report that it is noisy

website_summaries.verdict: This ice maker’s ease of use makes it perfect when you need a quick freeze without a lot of effort.
pros: The handy LED notification light lets you know when the water needs to be refilled
This makes continuous ice-making an easy proposition, without constant checking of the water level
cons: The ice maker sometimes smells hot during its regular ice making process, even though it’s working properly

customer_reviews.title: Let there be ice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take in our camper with us so we always had fresh ice for drinks. It arrived in a timely manner and with no issues. I did and started it up and was a no time we had ice seems to be working fine if anything changes I will do an update to this post.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I have one at the lake house on the screen porch. It has worked through 3 hot summers and is still going. When my ice maker at home went out, I bought another one to keep at home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen appliance i've bought
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old refrigerator and the ice maker keeps freezing up. I'm done with it. Purchased this countertop ice maker and we LOVE it. Even bought the ice bags to go with it and we fill one up and turn off the machine. Ice cubes are great. They do tend to freeze together since they are wet when you get the cubes but a few wacks on the ground and they break up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Read the review...
customer_reviews.text: The first one that came didn’t work, customer service was great and item was replaced quickly. The maker doesn’t seem to be cold enough to make hard ice. It’s very white and sticks together. Melting quickly in drinks. That being said it’s working okay, I had never had one before so maybe that’s just how they are.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ice maker! I drink everything on ice, but don’t have an ice maker in my freezer. We use this about every other day. The ice is a great size. I use distilled water as I don’t like the taste from our faucet and there is no taste to my ice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: It's fast.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ice maker, it can make a lot of ice in a short time. Sent one to our daughter and son-in-law for Christmas and they love theirs too.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Pagel-Day

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you need an ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a party we had and it was perfect! Looks good, works as advertised and easy to use. Definitely recommend and will be used in our bar from here on out
customer_reviews.author: Justin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds more like a meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: When you first get this ice maker, be sure to let it set idle for the first hour! After which it will strat working. After a month and a half it started grinding like it had gravel or something in it. Called Amazon and they said it only had a 30 day warrenty, and I had missed that day by 15 gays. I have not had very good luck with igoo third system and all fail with in 2 years. I will say i do use them 24 7 by 365 if this could be the problem.
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Igloo ice machine! I have had it a few months now and I’ve had no problems with it whatsoever!! Easy set up, easy use!! It makes approximately a 24 pd bag in a days time ( I eat/use in between this, too) with no problems! Just keep distilled water filled and basket emptied and you are set to go!! I only hear noise when ice drops and water needs to be refilled. I purchased the Igloo for personal use in my home and it has been a delight!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute, compact, fast but needs your full attention while making ice.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mini ice maker, so I don’t having to compare to... But you have to dump the ice that is made quick or the cubes melt. Plus, the basket is small, once it’s full, ice stops being made even though it’s not close to being full. Not sure if other products have the same issues, maybe this is normal. But the good part is that It’s cute, compact, makes ice fast, and it’s quiet. As long as I know to dump basket often it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jme Shan

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this ice maker takes up little counter space. I have had other ice makers and this one is the most compact without compromising ice production.
customer_reviews.author: Krak

customer_reviews.title: Ice Ice
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy. I bought it for Christmas and to use for our many family get-togethers and it worked like a charm. It was really loud but when you are having a party you can't hear it at all. It makes soft ice which was great for all the ice eaters and worked for drinks as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice fast, doesn't keep it frozen after.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy enough to use and it makes ice quickly. *** It does NOT keep the ice it just made frozen. It just puts it on a tray with a clear plastic cover so you can see the ice is ready. It melts if you aren't paying attention. I hate that and wish it could actually have a little freezer compartment so you don't have to babysit this thing while it is making ice.
customer_reviews.author: Heatcard

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for a month and stopped making ice. Loved it up till then.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Needs almost constant attention
customer_reviews.text: It makes a small amount of ice every several minutes, then automatically dumps them into a small basket, then repeats. About every hour the basket fills up and it either shuts itself down or the ice backs up into the back of the mechanisms. It would take at least 24 hours to make a bag of ice, which would require someone to empty the small basket every hour. Not worth the effort required to get even a moderate amount of ice. Ice for a standard size cooler? You'll run out of patience before you fill it. It's a bit loud and, at the size of a bread machine, takes up a good chunk of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: CptJoe

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy and makes delicious ice! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice maker!! It makes really good ice, really quickly. It’s not too noisy at all, I gave 4 stars because it’s not silent, but the noise doesn’t bother me. Very easy to set up and keeps delicious ice ready for me allll day!!! If you are constantly filling ice trays and running out of ice, and waiting for it to freeze, this is a great alternative. I contemplated whether this was something I NEEDED for a long time. I finally decided to give it a shot and couldn’t be happier! I’m going to be getting another to bring to my cabin, no more ice trays for me!
customer_reviews.author: ChelC

customer_reviews.title: Makes nice ice for hours at a time!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for ice lovers! This machine keeps producing batches of ice for hours! The cubes are a decent size and are made in just 8 minutes! So nice! Love this. Buy it! Super easy to use. Just lift the ice basket, fill with water, choose cube size (both options, large and small, are about the same size..the large is a little taller) Only added 4 cups of water and it was making ice for two hours. It comes with a scooper to help with serving the ice into peoples' cups or filling a freezer bag full! When you are done making ice, draining is simple. There is a pool floatie style rubber cap underneath that the reservoir drains from.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working after 7 months. BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: 7 months after purchase STOPPED WORKING!!! Was used properly, after reading other reviews we are convinced this is a crap product not built to last. Save yourself some money and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Casey R. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator in my new place doesn’t have an ice maker so I bought this because, well, it’s cheaper than buying a new fridge and less annoying than using ice trays. Idk exactly what the issue is, but everyday when I get home the ice maker has completely shut off. There’s usually no ice left and I have to unplug it for it to start again. It’s really annoying and, for the cost of this machine, a complete inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Allisha Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: My friend has an ice maker like this (Different brand). I wanted one. I looked at several different ones. The reviews were good. Price was good. Igloo ice maker not good. It worked for a few weeks. Then the panel that raises to make the ice got stuck. Turned it off and on. Worked a few minutes & stalled again. Now the water is filling up too much and not making ice. USELESS machine. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: ktown

customer_reviews.title: Love it...so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! Effortless, ceaseless, endless ice!! To be honest, the first one I ordered didn't work. It went through the motions, but didn't deliver the ice. Amazon couldn't have been nicer in replacing it. This one rocks!! 9 cubes every 7 minutes. Well, not cubes but rather bullets. The water in our town is loaded with chlorine rendering the icemaker in our refrigerator useless. As a result I was going to the store twice a week just for ice. No more! Now, whenever I'm at the store, I pick up a couple gallons of spring water @ a buck each and I'm good to go. Hope it lasts, but so far, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Needed Ice
customer_reviews.text: This is my third ice maker. I hope it lives long and prospers. Seems if ice makers are too full and the electricity goes off and the ice melts it kills the pick up the water part. I've had bad luck because I live in the lightening capital of the world and it always kills my ice makers. Anyway this one works great and is a pretty color. Just have to remember not to fill it to the tip top when ice is already there.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Really Pumps Out the Little Ice Cubes
customer_reviews.text: Only had this little ice maker about two months and so far we are very pleased. It is simple to maintain, takes up little space, pumps out ice like mad, although my Yorkies hate the noise it makes. Can't vouch for longevity but it appears to be well built, operates without a flaw, and if it goes in a year or two it's cheap enough to buy another one. It beats my ice maker in our refrigerator which only works occasionally and easily provides more ice that we can use by running it only a few minutes a day. Would recommend to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: HARD WORKING ICE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for our camper to supplement our ice and make ice for beach cooler everyday. Let me tell you this thing works great! Turns out a large cube batch of ice every 9 minutes. You cant even hear it over our camper air conditioner. Just keep it full of water and empty the ice and it will work its heart out. We had a blast just watching it make ice. It is perfect for my wife, son and myself. You just plug it in fill with water and watch it go. I definitely recommend this unit. Also love the robin egg retro color.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice chewing habit!
customer_reviews.text: Love ice and this item is great! Ice is soft enough to chew on but not crumble. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is a handy little device
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since June, and I love it. That said, it does have a few quirks. It can be somewhat noisy, especially when the ice drops into the tray. It also fills up fast, so if you aren't actively using ice my suggestion is to put the ice in a baggie and stick it in the freezer. Also, if you let the ice sit overnight, it tends to be melty in the morning when you get your first cup of ice. However, if you empty the tray, it fills up again fairly quickly. All in all, a good buy for the price point and I am satisfied with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No worries. Works fairly well. Have only used it a couple months @ 1-2 times a week with a full reservoir. If there was any little con, it would be that once it drops the cubes, they are really wet so if you don't want a ice tray "Glob" pour the cubes into a clean towel or similar and shake excess water out prior to dumping in the freezer container. And even then, you have to do some breaking apart once it's all frozen, but it's minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: The paper covered plug looking thing
customer_reviews.text: I love the ice makes so quickly. They melt if you leave them in the machine to long but if you dump them into a container and put them in the freezer they stay pretty well. I do have to break them apart sometimes but overall it is great. My only question is there is what appears to be a plug on the bottom of the machine wrapped in paper . What is it and should I remove paper for cleaning? Any ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie O.

customer_reviews.title: Ice Ice Baby
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best purchase I’ve ever made. I use it every day. I never knew have a steady supply of ice could make me so happy. I always have my ice water with me and my big bubba cup matches my ice maker - both aqua. It makes ice fast and the ice lasts. If your family has a high demand for ice, or maybe you like having Margarita parties, or maybe you are smoothie person, maybe you hate how much room ice takes up in your freezer- you need this machine.
customer_reviews.author: prettyplainjo

customer_reviews.title: By far the best product I've purchased in the last year.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express enough how awesome this ice maker is. I see some comments concerning noise and ice sticking together. The noise is not that bad for me. The ice sticking together is not a problem either. Just a tap with a wooden spoon and the ice falls apart. I use this machine every single day. For those of you who like crunching ice, you will be in heaven with the wonderfully airy ice.
customer_reviews.author: dg50484

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want an ice maker in the refrigerator as it is not something that I like. So I purchased this Igloo ice maker that sits on the counter and I love it. I make ice about two times a week and set it up to make ice while I am at my computer in the kitchen. I know it is slow but I really do not care about that. I make two gallons of ice and then turn it off and no worries about dripping down the refrigerator door as it is not in the refrig. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fancypants

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ice on demand
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy ice every other week, now with Stay-at-home orders, this makes perfect drink cubes in a matter of minutes. I don't like wasting freezer space with annoying trays or a built in ice maker. I use only purified drinking water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 hours old and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! My daughter and I love ice in our drinks. Honestly this was the best choice. Even though we have had it for maybe 4 hours it has made 4 pounds of ice! I turned it off for bed so I didn’t have to worry about it going while I slept!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We use ice...lots of it....our refrigerator can't keep up so decided to try this.....gotta say so far I am impressed. We turn it on for a few hours each day and have enough to supplement what the fridge can make. Also thought it would be great in the motorhome as we do not have an icemaker and get tired of the mess of keeping a cooler full if ice. Hope it hold us because I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Freaking killer!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our daughter in college for Christmas. She absolutely loves it! She opened it and plugged it up. 8 minutes later we had ice! It consistently put out ice every 8 minutes. The only thing I thought was a negative was when it runs out of water it shuts off and the ice melts. It doesn't keep it frozen. But it doesn't advertise it that way, so I guess I should have researched more. Overall she is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ermert

customer_reviews.title: I love my little ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Our refrigerator didn't come with an ice maker and trays are a pain and take up too much space. My uncle gifted me his old one to see if I could repair it but it was not meant to be. So I ordered this one. It's just about perfect for our little family.. it has no problem at all keeping up with our usage. If I could change anything it would have been a larger container for the ice but it really doesn't need that unless we have some kind of big gathering and that's incredibly unlikely lol. It's perfect for our family - three adults and the occasional pieces of ice in the dogs and cats water bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Jorychi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cubes.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought to use in my office area so I could make shakes. We moved it out to my nutrition bar as a back up for the fridge because we kept running out of ice. The ice is soft initially but we bag it and put it in the freezer. Everyone loves the way the cubes look in their drinks and once it’s in the freezer it’s better quality. It’s continuously making ice when we have it on. I use bottled gallon water to fill it and it’s quite easy to clean. I recommended it to my brother n law to use as his ice maker quit working on his fridge. Now I want one for my 5th wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Have had two of these now, and both of them broke within 3 months. Followed all the instructions for set up, machines were cleaned and well cared for. They ran into identical mechanical issues, where the water bowl/lever would stop lifting into position and would just mechanically whirr at the back. The ice was good until the machines stopped working, but these are the shortest lived machines I have ever owned. I can't even return the replacement one I was sent. Waste of money. Get a different ice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Greatest kitchen appliance I never knew I needed to have! We don’t have an ice maker and with all the kids, ice trays are such a hassle from taking up space in the freezer to breaking them trying to pop them out to spilling water all over the floor this ice maker changed it all. So easy to just pour water in an let it do all the work. Great size it fits into most water bottles we have. Quick fill up for big crowds. Only complaint is the size is kinda large so if you have a smaller kitchen, it may not be as convenient for you.
customer_reviews.author: Beth snider

customer_reviews.title: Read the full description - this is not a freezer-it’s a cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a freezer. The ice is a little wet and it melts if you don’t immediately use it or place in the freezer. The ice melt falls to the bottom water reservoir and then refreezes so the unit will never stop running if you don’t take the ice out. At first I was going to return it but now I am regularly emptying the bin it is growing on me. It is really fast! It tastes as good as the water you use. It does throw off a good amount of heat and is a little noisy.
customer_reviews.author: jacq

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's an 8
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Flavor of the ice is usually clean, but every once in a while I do get an off taste in the ice and have to chuck it. Noisy ..... quit loud; startles the dog at times. Wish it had some type of insulation. By the time the basket is full, the bottom batches are rather wet and partially melted. I try to run a batch while cooking dinner so as it produces, I can blot the bullet size cubes off and then toss them in a bowl in the freezer to avoid it becoming a solid mass.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker rocks
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker works great. Makes ice fast and isn’t too noisy. I bought a different brand for my son last year and I can honestly say, this one is superior, although less expensive. We have a fairly new fridge and the ice maker doesn’t work reliably so this takes its place. I dump the ice in the bin and use it as Needed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 3 months. Then, just QUIT making ice. Red light came on saying it needed water when it was FULL of water. Would NOT make any ice any longer. Other brands have lasted MUCH longer than this one for me. Thought I could trust the Igloo name, but apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for our ice maker that stopped working in our fridge. Small compact and fit perfectly on top of water cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Sollars

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product malfunctions easily & breaks
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 of these first one was leaking coolant so replaced it. Second one worked one time the second time it was put to use it malfunctioned we ran through the reset process which we had to find online it was not in the manual it started creating incomplete cubes that melted shortly after then malfunctioned again. So we went through the reset process again this time it started leaking coolant so we gave up & returned it. Poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great.
customer_reviews.text: I desperately wanted a counter-top ice maker that would have available ice cubes since my automatic ice maker in my fridge can't always keep up with demand. If you are ready to use the ice immediately it works great. My home's temperature was within the specified allowance and still the ice would begin melting just minutes after it was dropped into the tray. The actual machine was also a little too big for my counter space. Great idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl C LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: Decent ice maker
customer_reviews.text: During the summer we go through a lot of ice, so we got this as a backup to our fridge dispenser. We love the shape of the ice, with rounded tops, and that you can choose a small or large cube. It’s easy to use, too. The only thing I dislike is that it leaves the finished cubes very wet, so when you put them in the freezer, they freeze together in a large clump. I’m not sure how that could be helped, though. We like it, nevertheless, and bag up lots of extra ice.
customer_reviews.author: R Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 3 weeks it worked
customer_reviews.text: Was great...for the time it worked. Less than a month of light use and it was garbage. Per amazon, it's a non-returnable item, so buyer beware. Little dump tray was getting hung up in the up position, and wont return to make ice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! I’ve attached a time lapse video to show it in action. It would be even better if they had a way to keep the ice cold after it’s made instead of having to transfer it to the freezer right after. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ghawi

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice very quickly, and has either large or small cubes. Easy to use. Very simple., Makes a little noise, but not too much. However, once it stops making ice, the ice in the unit melts, and then it has to re-make the ice. So, in essence the unit keeps making ice over and over. I bought this because the ice maker in our $3500 Samsung refrigerator has broken, and is still broken after spending over $400 on repairs. I now use the Igloo unit for ice. Just fill it and turn on when I need some. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Owensby

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it makes ice within 7 to 8 minutes but I have been having an issue with the ice tasting like a chemical or plastic no matter how many times I have cleaned it. I’ve used lemon juice with some vinegar, I have also used normal dish soap with a warm, wet rag and the ice still tastes bad. I bought two of these and the first one works perfectly and the ice taste normal. The second one however is the one that has been having issues and not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Flamez

customer_reviews.title: 3 of 3 have died
customer_reviews.text: The ice machines, so far 3 out of 3 in our break rooms, have died. The plastic cage that collects the ice gets jammed in the back, and it doesn't work. The lights flash and it stops making ice. If this were 1 or 2, or if we had had these more than a month, I get it. But 3 of 3?! Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how fast it makes ice. I use this in my RV where freezer space is limited. Now that I drink twice as much due to the turmoil our world is in thanks to the CCP virus this thing is priceless. Provides enough ice for a friend to join you in numbing the misery away.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Power Sports Promotion

customer_reviews.title: Ice always in a state of melt
customer_reviews.text: Cute color and idea but I can't recommend. Ice storage area and lid has no insulation, so it melts too quick. The premise is that it makes ice, and if you don't remove, it lets it melt and then makes new ice from melted water. Problem is that the ice is always half melted. I would give more stars if it was insulated. I think other brands may be better. Cute machine though.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ice, Baby
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with this purchasing experience. The item itself 5/5 - the SELLER is definitely 10/10!! Seller was contacted for help after we took delivery of the item. Response was quick, professional, courteous, succinct and 100% effective. You could not ask for better deal or better service.
customer_reviews.author: Psahvrin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Countertop Ice
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. I wish i had known that it doesn't hold ice as sometimes it melts before we can use it (and I can't always put it in the freezer as it finishes). Good thing is that it makes ice quickly so we are only waiting a few minutes. Works great for satisfying my urge to crunch ice without hurting my teeth. For best results use with cool drinks as warm drinks melt the ice very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Licon

customer_reviews.title: Quick and good chewable ice
customer_reviews.text: The ice is made fast, about 6-7 mins for the first cubes to be made. the maker isn't too loud or as warm outside as i expected. I was looking for an ice chip maker to gift to a terminally ill person who is on limited fluid intake and even though this makes cubes, they are hollow and chewable. He has had it about a month and uses it daily, even making apple juice cubes. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N

customer_reviews.title: Fast ice-but a small issue
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this ice maker while we wait to get a new fridge with an ice maker. I love how fast it makes the cubes. We have had a problem with it getting stuck in between cycles though. Which makes it frustrating when you think it’s making ice and you come back to find out that it’s not. We have only had it for 2 months so we are past the return window- otherwise I would try to return it for a manufacturers defect as I’m assuming that’s why it’s getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dying after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: The drawer that shifts the ice cubes is sticking and stops moving. I did request warranty information from Amazon, but have received nothing. I called Igloo warranty support (from the page I was directed to from the Amazon listing of product support) and was told they do not support this device. I was told I needed to contact the store where I purchased it to get the correct number. We have an earlier version of this that is still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product works great. Ice reasonably fast, nice cube size, and easy to use. My only minor complaint is draining the water requires moving the entire unique and positioning a bucket underneath, or moving it over a sink. If there was tubing included, that would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great for gatherings
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS BECAUSE WE WERE HAVING FAMILY OVER FOR THANKSGIVING AND I DID NOT WANT TO RUN OUT OF ICE. ISATRTED IT THAT MORNING AND HAD 8LBS OF ICE BY THE TIME EVERYONE STARTED ARRIVING AND I JUST KEPT ADDING WATER AND I DID NOT HAVE TO RUSH TO THE ICE MACHINE FOR ANOTHER BAG. GREAT APPLIANCE TO HAVE IF YOU LIKE TO ENTERTAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Defective - And No RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get my ice-maker. This made it all more disappointing when it didn't work. It kept jamming and the LED lights kept locking up. I did the trouble shooting listed in the book. That didn't work. So I went to You Tube. I saw that my scoop thing that is suppose to lift and tip ice into bucket was not working. Then it jammed the machine. I then contact AMAZON to get a return ticket and order another one, only for them to tell me this item is NOT returnable! I have looked at my receipt and the listing for the item and it says nothing about this. Very unhappy and am pursuing further.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Makes great size ice for drinks
customer_reviews.text: Fill with filtered water in the morning.. Start it up and have great ice anytime, all day long. Pauses when ice bucket is full and starts up again when you take some. From some or the reviews I must have gotten a good one, very soft fan noise when making ice. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check out their products
customer_reviews.text: Made one block of ice and then quit. Says I had add water. Reservoir is full piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating experience not  make ice consistently
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is similar to one I bought awhile ago but it doesn’t work nearly as well. The ice making cycle cuts off before the bin is full and then the ice melts and all the lights on the top flash... In order to get ice I have to turn it off and back on again. Not sure if this one is defective. When it makes ice, the cubes are made quickly but it just isn’t reliable. Less than a month old so I may need to request a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Annie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty enough for your counter top!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this particular model because of the color. It’s really pretty and works really well! We will be using it in our RV and the ice didn’t melt as we expected, so we put it in the freezer and still have some!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good ice maker for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quiet and quick ice maker. The only real noise it makes is when it dumps the ice into the bin. Other than that you can't hear it. I am impressed at how quickly it made ice. Within a few minutes I had 7 or 8 pieces of ice. Great ice maker for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LSMom

customer_reviews.title: It makes ice... but it's not good ice
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this 1 star, but it did make ice, so... The machine gets JUST cold enough to freeze, but not stay frozen. It took ~2.5 hours to fill the tray, and by the time it finished, the ice on the bottom had already melted. Putting the ice that this machine produces in a beverage melts almost immediately due to the lack of internal "coldness" and therefore, if you don't like watered-down drinks, don't buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Riley.

customer_reviews.title: Started working as soon as I set it up !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE This Little Ice Maker ~ My One in the freezer broke, and, to have a service man come out and fix it -or install a new one-was MUCH more than the price of this Igloo !! I just pray that it keeps working ! Summer is coming ! :)
customer_reviews.author: Prim

customer_reviews.title: Faulty device
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ice maker in April for use in our camper. First use was in July while we were camping, we noticed that after the ice was created the bucket would not tilt enough for all the ice cubes to fall into the basket. There would be a few ice cubes that would attach themselves to the next round. When the basket got full the ice maker did not register, and would continue to make more ice. Extremely disappointed in this brand. We have bought cheaper ice makers that lasted years under heavy use that didn't give us the problem this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Just pour water in and turn on. This little ice maker is awesome! Works great, quiet and makes ice quickly. The cubes are small. One small drawback is that it doesn't keep the ice frozen, you have to remove it from the tray and store it, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: We are not happy that it quit working after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Feb2020, used three times, and it worked great, but today it runs, makes a single load of ice, then all the lights are flashing and it is not making ice or doing anything else. It is stored in our kitchen and protected from harm, and then placed next to the sink when operating. We are very, very disappointed, however their Customer Service is great and we are hoping to have the replacement unit in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: G. Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I keep telling my husband this is the best decision I've ever made. I think it makes him feel bad. I should change it to this is the best purchase decision I've ever made. It has been so hot here this summer and there are eight adults in the house during COVID. This has been a lifesaver appliance. We have all had plenty of ice, made very quickly, for all the cold drinks we need. I absolutely love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived yesterday. Followed instructions to the T. Pump failed to send water to part of the machine that forms ice. Called Igloo directly and they advised me to return item. Now I have to bring this very heavy box to a UPS drop off site Not one tad bit happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great product and makes amazing ice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in our travel trailer and has now become our primary ice for drinks at home. While traveling it’s nice to have instead of pulling ice from a cooler for drinks. Fits well on the counter in the trailer. At the house it looks good on the counter, isn’t too loud and barely noticeable. Has been producing ice for months all day everyday with no issues. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Poir quality return in 2 weeks had to pay for shipping for a heavy item
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in a couple weeks and then I had to pay 65.00 due to weight,to ship -it back even though I am a prime member.Beware when buying on Amazon only purchase "guarentee return shipping" I want a refund on shipping
customer_reviews.author: Buyer TX

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bit loud...
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed the quick out pit of ice cubes! This machine is great! The cubes melt faster than I’ve bought at the store and the machine is a bit loud. I think my dishwasher is running when he turns it on. But we are happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MS Travelers Rest

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: Good ice machine Bought it for my mom She liked it a lot plus the color of it..
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice maker! Yes it doesn't keep them frozen but of course your buying a little ice maker not a mini freezer! I let mine run and let it fill up the basket (drain the water in the basket because yes some melt) then put it in a bag and repeate until your bag is full....boom ice! Never have to buy ice again! And its perfect for eating ice!! I am obsessed with eating ice! Plus it says you can put any liquid other then water in it to make flavor ice. I haven't tried it yet but I will eventually
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little ice maker. I'm pregnant and the ice is super easy to crunch on. Makes ice quick as well. So seen a lot of people saying the ice melts too quick, let the first few loads of ice melt back into the water, the following ice cubes are much stronger and last longer from having colder water. It takes it about a hour to fill the basket before you need to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Makes Ice
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced the automatic ice maker in our refrigerator twice over the last 20 years. Not worth doing again so I ordered this ice maker as a substitute. It does a very good job in making cubes very quickly. The cubes are perfectly sized for bottles and water carriers. Still not certain about the size difference for the two settings. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: John Kulha

customer_reviews.title: Lots of ice quickly
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying ice and more ice since receiving this item < 5 days ago. Very quiet, surprised by that for sure. Easy setup and use so far just enjoying ice in every drink I get my hands on. Looks bigger than it is and so far really hasn’t taken too much space. I told one of my friends about and is going to see if her kids can get it for her for Mother’s Day. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than trying to carry ice cube trays to freezer>
customer_reviews.text: I like this appliance quite well. The biggest negative is that the cubes are wet when they are done. After putting then in freezer they freeze together. If I hit them with the scoop, they break up enough to put them in my water container. Otherwise, I am happy that I have this ice maker!!
customer_reviews.author: R.A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned after a month or so :(
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay for about a month and now suddenly the mechanism that rotates and scoops the ice into the strainer keeps malfunctioning and getting stuck, then all the lights start blinking and it shuts off. Now I have to figure out if it has a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about two weeks. Now it won’t do anything. I’ve read the manual & tried everything suggested. Nothing works. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every single day since I got it. I use it to to three times a day. I make enough ice to have about 2 cups within a 2 to 3 hour period. Super easy to get the water out. And the ice is nice. Sometimes it comes out super easy to chew on. It has made my bedroom extra bougie.
customer_reviews.author: Ashgyrl

customer_reviews.title: Misinformation
customer_reviews.text: No instructions Fresh bottled water produced an after taste after going through the ice maker system Pressed the button for small ice but large came out and vice versa It gets really hot with usage The ice doesn’t stay frozen in the machine There are no controls to dictate the temperature, no filter, just a big box😢
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: My old Igloo ice maker went bad after 6 years of reliable use. I bought this replacement and haven't had any issues with it. It works just as well as my last Igloo ice maker, which gets used daily. Overall a great product. **NOTE: Yhe first unit that was sent was defective. Amazon did great in taking the defective unit and had a new one to me in the last few days.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Table Top Icemaker is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact this table top ice maker performs as described. I moved into a small apartment with limited counter space. It is perfect since the Fridge doesn't have one. Plus when I travel, it comes in handy, I like the way it looks too!
customer_reviews.author: Rocketmom

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the rare product that works as advertised. It makes ice quickly. If there is any concern, it is that the lid is plastic so it doesn't keep the ice cubes in tact for a long time; they will melt over several hours. But I don't think that's a reason not to buy this product -- it's not a Yeti, for goodness sake. It makes lots of ice cubes quickly, which is what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Died right after warranty expired!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker worked fine for 1 year and "2" weeks, literally died right after the warranty expired. To the companies credit they honored the warranty and sent a replacement. However the new one came with no warranty, and it just died in less than a month! I called and was politely told nothing that they would do! As for the ice, it was not solid, and melts quickly. Buy if you are a gambler!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Needed adjustments,  but works satisfactorily now. Pleased with ice cubes.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work when first tried. Sweeper arm was flipped over backward-- I wanted to send it back, but my husband put sweeper arm back in place and then it worked as was supposed to. Then it worked well and are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked from day one. I did everything it said to do and then all lights start blinking saying power failure so i followed the instructions many times and it keeps doing the same thing. Unfortunately i live in CA and with all the craziness from COVID-19 and all the fires and being evacuated i went over the 30 day and can no longer return it.Talk about a very expensive paper weight.I have had these in the past and they were great but for some reason this one straight out of the box wont work. Im very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Ice Maker - Failure
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money at that price point. Noisy during operation. Ice cubes do not stay cold in ice basket, so they start to melt. Only used it 3 times just under a year, so it was too late to return, as you only had 3 months warranty. Large ice that comes out, is what I would consider the small size. So the small size is pretty much useless. Wish I could get my money back for sure, or a better model if Amazon allowed an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my in-fridge dispenser stopped working and I didn't want to buy a new fridge yet. It makes a LOT of ice and is very simple to use. You do need to check it periodically if you leave it running because it'll stop when the ice basket gets full and the ice will then start to melt back into the reservoir. My kids thought there was a metallic taste to the ice the first few days, but it went away. Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to have an ice maker in the RV... after 1 week stoped working!!!!😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice appliance, especially for the price. It takes some time to fill in the bin with ice cubes, as every batch takes about 5-10 minutes but it needs several batches to fill the whole bin. The ice cubes are nicely shaped and taste well. However, the ice maker does not retain cold too well, so you want to either keep it running all the time (it will make new cubes from those that melt) or else (better) empty the bin in your freezer once the bin is filled with cubes.
customer_reviews.author: MTA

customer_reviews.title: I want a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine barely worked for the first couple of days and it was VERY loud! Now it will only make big chunks of ice instead of cubes if it makes any at all. I’ve been jumping through hoops for several weeks trying to get a refund from the seller who wants ME to pay for shipping back a defective item’
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Junk find different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one last couple years but I had to do a work around that I found on YouTube to keep it alive. We had to hold down some buttons to reset computer. Everyone in the house learned how to do it. This new one is a big piece of JUNK I’m going to throw it away and by a different brand. I’m not going on YouTube to fix the computer again.
customer_reviews.author: Billy 100

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this ice maker for five months. Here are my issues. 1. It has only ever made one size of ice, no matter which setting it was on. 2. Recently the "full" sensor has stopped working and it will continue to make ice and over fill until it's jammed. The only way to get it to stop is by turning it off. 3. While cleaning the inside is easy, there is an ice forming tray in the back that gets gross but you can't get to it to clean it well.
customer_reviews.author: crystie welte

product_meta.title: Igloo ICEB26WH Automatic Portable Electric Countertop Ice Maker Machine, 26 Pounds in 24 Hours, 9 Cubes Ready in 7 minutes, With Scoop and Basket, Perfect for Water Bottles, Mixed Drinks, Parties, WHT
product_meta.description: Color:WHTSay hello to this perfectly compact, stylish and portable appliance that will keep your beverages nice and chilled! With the ability to make ice in as little as 7 minutes, this unit has the capability to produce 26 pounds of ice per day. A viewing window allows you watch the ice being made, while the 2 pound ice basket ensures plenty of capacity for all of your beverage needs. The LED lighted control panel lets you to choose from small or large ice cube sizes, while also letting you know when to add water and if the ice basket is full. Perfect for pool parties, home bars, dorm rooms, offices and more. Cold Drinks. Warm Smiles.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR CONVENIENCE: Portable, convenient and compACt in size, this retro red ice maker looks good on a countertop while producing ice for whenever or wherever you need it
Large ice making capACity: keep the water tank filled and this unit will produce 26 pounds of ice in a 24 hour period enough to keep drinks cold all day long

Control panel: simple to understand and illuminated with led lights, the electronic control panel lets you know when you need to add water, when the ice basket is full and allows you to choose the size of the ice cubes
Transparent lid : large clear lid allows for easy viewing of ice cube capacity
Simple serving : remove the ice basket to move large quantities of ice, then utilize the included ice scoop to fill beverage glasses
Drain plug : remove to easily drain water from the unit when not in use
Ice basket capACity: stores up to 2 pounds of ice at a time
Quick freezing ice: makes 9 small or large cylinder shaped ice cubes in as little as 7 minutes
Removable ice basket: ice basket easily removes to transfer ice cubes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,271 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
